short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension shows Bikram Sambat Calendar date as extension icon, monthly calendar as dropdown for Chrome browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple lightweight extension to show current Bikram Sambat date and Month in chrome browser as extension icon. 

Features:
* Lightweight 
* Run only once when you come back from idle mode or when chrome start.
* Doesn't track user details

Usage:
* please pin the extension for viewing the today Bikram Sambat date. 

Team:
* Developer - Rabin Shrestha
* Tester - Madhav Paudel
* Graphics - Rajeev Shrestha
* Support - Sandip Joshi
